Name: Vitor Novo
Description: Hello! I'm Vitor Novo, a Software Engineering enthusiast, my passion lies in Back End development, where I bring systems and applications to life through logic and programming. I am particularly enthusiastic about game development and software creation. I enjoy tackling new challenges and expanding my skill so I’am excited to continue expanding my knowledge and contributing to challenging and impactful projects. My main hoobies are skateboarding and game creation.

Educations.School: University of Trás-os-Montes and Alto Douro

Skills.Name: Git
Skills.Description: Version control, commits and resolving conflicts

Works.Name: Waiter
Works.Description: Seasonal waiter in a Restaurant, even if it was a non engineering work, I gained valuable skills that I can bring to the table, including proficiency in multitasking and facilitating clear and responsive communication.
